	<item>
		<title>Blog Framed Mode</title>
		<link>http://strikingrwptheme.com/2016smalldemo/blog/blog-list-framed-mode/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 26 Dec 2013 13:11:11 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin-wpt]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/?page_id=2315</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>The striking bloglist framed mode</h2>
[divider_line]
In a bloglist each item can be presented in a frame. A area with a border around it. The border color, thickness as the inner background color of the framed area can be set in the striking blog settings or overwritten by the striking blogshortcode parameters.  Within the frame all the other blog (shortcode parameters) settings apply to each of the items in the bloglist.

<img src="http://strikingrwptheme.com/2016smalldemo/wp-content/uploads/sites/38/2013/12/striking-framed-mode-settings.png" alt="striking-framed-mode-settings" width="620" height="309" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2353" />

[divider_padding]

<h3>Framed Bloglist with full featured image above the title</h2>[divider_line]
[code][blog count="1" nopaging="true" imageType="full" frame="true"][/code]
[blog count="1" nopaging="true" imageType="full" frame="true"]




[divider_padding]

<h3>Framed Bloglist with full featured image below the title & custom color</h3>
[divider_line]
[code][blog count="1" posts="221" nopaging="true" imageType="below"  frame="true"  frame_bgColor="rgba(60,171,206,.06)" frame_borderColor="rgba(60,171,206,.1)"  frame_borderThickness="4"] [/code]
[blog count="1" posts="221" nopaging="true" imageType="below"  frame="true"  frame_bgColor="rgba(60,171,206,.06)" frame_borderColor="rgba(60,171,206,.1)"  frame_borderThickness="4"] 




[divider_padding]

<h3>Framed Bloglist with Left featured image</h3>
[divider_line]
[code][blog count="1" nopaging="true" imageType="left" frame="true"] [/code]
[blog count="1" nopaging="true" imageType="left" frame="true"] 



[divider_padding]

<h3>Framed Bloglist with right featured image & custom color</h3>
[divider_line]
[code][blog count="1" posts="221" nopaging="true" imageType="right"  frame="true"  frame_bgColor="rgba(0,0,0,0.05)" frame_borderThickness="4"]  [/code]
[blog count="1" posts="221" nopaging="true" imageType="right"  frame="true"  frame_bgColor="rgba(0,0,0,0.05)" frame_borderThickness="4"] 
]]></content:encoded>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>The Striking Landing Page</h2>

The landing page is like any other page except that it is a page without a menu and a footer widget area. The layout (page with left sidebar, page with right sidebar or fullwidth) is picked up from the global theme settings. 

[info]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Quisque viverra hendrerit orci eu lacinia. Donec vehicula vitae risus sed feugiat. Cras vel leo convallis, ultrices enim vel, suscipit eros! Vestibulum sodales in erat id sagittis. Sed imperdiet felis enim, a interdum velit fermentum at. Aenean tristique ligula lacus, non auctor sem aliquet at. Etiam sodales lobortis tellus, sit amet porta elit faucibus eget. Integer vitae est a dolor accumsan laoreet? Phasellus rhoncus lectus eget lorem faucibus, vel pharetra nunc consectetur.
[/info]

[/content_box]

	<item>
		<title>Page with Sitemap</title>
		<link>http://strikingrwptheme.com/2016smalldemo/features/layouts/page-with-sitemap/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 29 Dec 2013 10:30:55 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin-wpt]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/?page_id=2554</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Page with the Sitemap Template</h2>

[content_box icon="comments-o" icon_color="#1036e6" title="Content Box" titleBgColor="rgba(204,202,202,1)"]A page with a sitemap can have any normal content. But it will display a complete sitemap below the content added in that page. The layout (page with left sidebar, page with right sidebar or fullwidth) is picked up from the global theme settings.

There is also a Sitemap Shortcode in Striking MultiFlex which allows for creating more limited sitemaps to be embedded in page content.  The shortcode has options to display by pages, cateogries, post items or portfolio items.
[/content_box] 

]]></content:encoded>

			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_custom_introduce_text]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<h2 style="text-align:center">The Custom text is shown here.</h2>[divider_padding]
[one_half]
[framed_box bgColor="#d7e7f5" borderColor="#ff0000" borderThickness="2" textColor="#393838"]You can add anything you prefer in this area as long as it is valid html or shortcode.</span> 
[divider_padding]
<h4>Progresses With Custom Color</h4>
[divider_line]
[progress percent="50" barcolor="#27ccc0" trackcolor="#c6c6c6"]
[progress percent="70" textcolor="#ffffff" barcolor="#3399ff" trackcolor="#a6a6a6"] 
[divider_line]
[/framed_box] [/one_half]
[one_half_last][iconbox icon="gift" iconSize="default" iconColor="#ffff00" title="Valid HTML Allowed" type="left"]Any valid html code or shortcode is allowed in the custom text area.[/iconbox] [/one_half_last]
<h2 style="text-align:center">The slider is shown here.</h2>[divider_padding]]]></wp:meta_value>

	<item>
		<title>Portfolio Posts</title>
		<link>http://strikingrwptheme.com/2016smalldemo/shortcodes/portfolio-posts/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 31 Dec 2013 11:07:17 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin-wpt]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/?page_id=2956</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h1>Portfolio Posts</h1>
[tabs]
[tab title="Parameters" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>Parameters</h3>
[divider_line]
[list icon="check" color="blue"]
<ul>
<li><strong>column</strong> (number of columns 1-8 to display)</li>
<li><strong>height</strong> (height of featured image) (optional)</li>
<li><strong>effect</strong> : icon, zoom, blurr, grayscale, rotate, morph, tilt, none (optional)</li>
<li><strong>layout</strong> : fullwidth, sidebar (optional)/li>
<li><strong>nopaging</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>sortable</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>sortable_all</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>ajax</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>cat</strong> : category to list</li>
<li><strong>current</strong> current category (optional)</li>
<li><strong>ids</strong> select items on id basis comma seperated (optional)</li>
<li><strong>orderby</strong> : no, page, author, post-id, title, date, random, parent-id, nr of comments, modified date (optional)</li>
<li><strong>order</strong> : DESC, ASC (optional)</li>
<li><strong>title</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>titleLinkable</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>titleLinkTarget</strong> : _blank, parent, new window, full body (optional)</li>
<li><strong>desc</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>desc_length</strong> : length of description (optional)</li>
<li><strong>advanceDesc</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>more</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>moreText</strong> : Read More Text (optional)</li>
<li><strong>moreButton</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
</ul>[/list]
[/tab]
[tab title="Shortcode Option Panel" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>Shortcode Option Panel</h3>
[divider_line]
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="3235" caption="Portfolio Shortcode Options Panel" alt="Portfolio Shortcode Options Panel" align="center" icon="zoom" width="594" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" title="Portfolio Shortcode Options Panel"] 
[/tab]
[/tabs]

[divider_padding]
<h2>Sample</h2>

[portfolio column="3" layout="sidebar" sortable="true" ajax="true" cat="animals,nature,people" current="nature" more="false" moreButton="false"] 

[divider_top]

[code]
[portfolio column="3" layout="sidebar" sortable="true" ajax="true" cat="animals,nature,people" current="nature" more="false" moreButton="false"] 
[/code]

[divider_top]]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Admin Panel Help Text</title>
		<link>http://strikingrwptheme.com/2016smalldemo/features/admin-panel-options/admin-panel-help-text/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 31 Dec 2013 12:41:38 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin-wpt]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/?page_id=2989</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Striking Help Information</h2>

The striking theme has buildin help. Almost every option in any setting of the theme, shortcode, page option panels is explained by build in help information.

<img src="http://strikingrwptheme.com/2016smalldemo/wp-content/uploads/sites/38/2013/12/striking-help-info.jpg" alt="striking-help-info" width="1141" height="597" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2992" />
[divider_top]
<h4 style="text-align:center;">All information is available at hand</h4>
[divider_padding]
<img src="http://strikingrwptheme.com/2016smalldemo/wp-content/uploads/sites/38/2013/12/striking-help-panels.jpg" alt="striking-help-panels" width="1128" height="519" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2993" />
[divider_line][divider_padding]
<h4 style="text-align:center;">Information Presented in Tables</h4>
[divider_padding]
<img src="http://strikingrwptheme.com/2016smalldemo/wp-content/uploads/sites/38/2013/12/help-info-tables.jpg" alt="help-info-tables" width="732" height="641" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2994" />
[divider_line][divider_padding]
<h4 style="text-align:center;">Example Code Provided</h4>
[divider_padding]
<img src="http://strikingrwptheme.com/2016smalldemo/wp-content/uploads/sites/38/2013/12/striking-help-examplecode.jpg" alt="striking-help-examplecode" width="849" height="785" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2999" />

Note : Example code can be copied and pasted  into your own website.
[divider_line][divider_padding]
<h4 style="text-align:center;">Demo Pages Contain Example Code Snippets</h4>
[divider_padding]
<img src="http://strikingrwptheme.com/2016smalldemo/wp-content/uploads/sites/38/2013/12/striking-help-demo-code.jpg" alt="striking-help-demo-code" width="668" height="531" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-3000" />


Note : Code snippets can be copied and pasted into your own website.
[divider_line][divider_padding]]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Masonry</title>
		<link>http://strikingrwptheme.com/2016smalldemo/shortcodes/masonry/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 16 Jan 2014 13:28:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin-wpt]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/?page_id=3302</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h1>Masonry</h1>
<h2>Parameters</h2>
[divider_line]
[list icon="check" color="blue"]
<ul>
<li><strong>column</strong> (how many columns to show): 2, 3, 4, 5</li>
<li><strong>number</strong> (number of posts to show per page)</li>
<li><strong>post_type</strong> (specific post type to show) (optional)</li>
<li><strong>taxonomy</strong> (specific taxonomy to show) (optional)</li>
<li><strong>posts</strong>  (specific posts to show) (optional)</li>
<li><strong>title</strong> (whether to display title): true,false</li>
<li><strong>desc</strong> (whether to display description): true,false</li>
<li><strong>paging</strong> (whether to display pagination): true,false</li>
</ul>

[divider_padding]
<h2>Samples</h2>
[divider_line]
<h3>Blog Masonry</h3>
[code]
[masonry post_type="post" number="6" column="2" desc="true" desc_length="15"]
[/code]

[masonry post_type="post" number="6" column="2" desc="true" desc_length="15"]

[divider_top]

<h3>Portfolio Masonry with Specific category</h3>
[code]
[masonry post_type="portfolio" taxonomy="portfolio_category" terms="Animals,Nature,People" number="6" column="3"] 
[/code]

[masonry post_type="portfolio" taxonomy="portfolio_category" terms="Animals,Nature,People" number="6" column="3"] 

[divider_top]

<h3>Portfolio Masonry without title and description</h3>
[code]
[masonry post_type="portfolio" taxonomy="portfolio_category" terms="Animals,Nature,People" number="6" column="3" title="false" desc="false"] 
[/code]

[masonry post_type="portfolio" taxonomy="portfolio_category" terms="Animals,Nature,People" number="6" column="3" title="false" desc="false"] 

[divider_top]

]]></content:encoded>

			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_page_background_position_x]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[center]]></wp:meta_value>

		<title>Elementum Erat Congue</title>
		<link>http://strikingrwptheme.com/2016smalldemo/2010/09/30/elementum-erat-congue/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Sep 2010 13:54:38 +0000</pubDate>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/?p=98</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Vestibulum in turpis ut mauris imperdiet accumsan. Class aptent taciti sociosqu ad litora torquent per conubia nostra, per inceptos himenaeos. Ut luctus ullamcorper diam quis congue. Proin erat augue, placerat sit amet fringilla et, adipiscing nec augue. Morbi blandit justo ac risus dictum eu laoreet neque imperdiet. Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Cras sit amet urna sed tortor scelerisque mollis non non elit. Integer at metus diam. Integer velit eros, rutrum sed auctor in, vulputate sit amet purus. Nam ipsum nunc, posuere elementum lacinia porta, commodo ut lacus. Ut dictum luctus leo, vitae ultrices odio auctor in. Phasellus quis sem sem, id feugiat lectus. Proin aliquam convallis sodales. Proin posuere odio at urna dictum nec placerat ante elementum. Pellentesque molestie adipiscing erat, sit amet vestibulum eros tristique eget. Cras facilisis imperdiet nulla, sed sollicitudin augue cursus a. Aliquam vitae libero ut leo volutpat lacinia id sed justo.

Cras mi lacus, adipiscing vitae aliquet eu, imperdiet sit amet risus. Pellentesque at quam purus, sed consequat dolor. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nam neque diam, ultrices ut viverra non, vehicula quis tellus. Pellentesque dapibus ullamcorper leo ornare pulvinar. Sed vel dui ipsum. Pellentesque sit amet felis turpis. Nunc lacinia pretium mauris, vitae lacinia magna lobortis ultrices. Maecenas vel luctus magna. Integer nec venenatis risus. Phasellus condimentum, tortor vel venenatis viverra, nunc enim adipiscing justo, id tincidunt dolor magna at nunc. Morbi euismod mi facilisis metus porta ac malesuada enim luctus. Donec gravida, mi tincidunt lobortis rutrum, mi dui dictum lacus, at aliquet lacus nulla sit amet risus. Sed id justo sit amet magna adipiscing porta facilisis ac lacus. Nam eleifend sagittis augue, quis aliquam erat suscipit in.

Sed rhoncus placerat aliquam. Donec pretium consequat augue, a mattis velit interdum at. Aenean molestie sapien vel diam malesuada pulvinar. Quisque congue, odio sit amet accumsan facilisis, lacus leo accumsan est, sit amet commodo augue augue eu diam. Mauris vitae libero id est viverra vulputate. Maecenas ultrices porta felis in adipiscing. In sed felis arcu. Sed at sapien velit. Sed interdumac dignissim dolor lorem sit amet massa. Donec fermentum scelerisque urna vel pellentesque. Sed et metus ac velit sodales pellentesque nec nec sapien. Cras ultrices est nec nisl viverra scelerisque. Curabitur porta tempus iaculis. Suspendisse mollis commodo sem, eget posuere est tempor lobortis. Nullam ullamcorper, lorem at convallis sollicitudin, augue sem consectetur arcu, vitae posuere neque lorem et nulla. Praesent ac euismod metus.

	<item>
		<title>Sed porttitor auctor magna.</title>
		<link>http://strikingrwptheme.com/2016smalldemo/2010/09/30/sed-porttitor-auctor-magna/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Sep 2010 12:00:28 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin-wpt]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/?p=2491</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Sed porttitor auctor magna. Quisque aliquam condimentum neque ac faucibus! Fusce molestie scelerisque elit, sed iaculis lectus mattis eget? Quisque molestie orci eget erat tempus lobortis. Donec tempor urna nec sollicitudin auctor? Pellentesque faucibus aliquet consectetur. Ut porta orci erat, sed bibendum quam auctor ac. Donec non molestie mi? Sed sodales sagittis sollicitudin. Morbi arcu dolor; mollis et eros eget, consectetur dapibus erat. Nam eu odio ac sem varius iaculis. Morbi fringilla orci dui, malesuada vehicula est porta in.

Mauris elementum mi in augue ullamcorper tincidunt. Morbi sed volutpat mi. Vestibulum ultrices cursus interdum. Phasellus purus libero, suscipit vel libero quis, viverra blandit nisl. Fusce sapien nisi, rutrum eu nulla id; ultrices commodo erat. Praesent accumsan a orci vel rutrum. Aliquam lacinia diam non quam pharetra cursus. Sed nec nisi placerat, vehicula odio eget, pharetra mi. Mauris a fringilla purus. Sed dignissim mi purus, sit amet tempus metus placerat a. Nullam non ultricies risus, id lacinia nibh. Nullam non ante id tellus interdum fringilla tristique a justo. Duis dictum tempus est varius porta.

Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Aliquam id tristique eros. Vivamus neque elit, hendrerit non enim nec, accumsan luctus tellus. Nunc non pulvinar libero. In vitae odio vitae sapien dapibus aliquet. Phasellus at dapibus nisl. Sed scelerisque semper odio non vehicula. Ut leo tellus, lobortis tempor metus vel, ultrices tempus elit! Aliquam erat volutpat. Sed ut metus nibh. Quisque ultricies felis sit amet neque pulvinar sodales. Aenean semper in quam sit amet vulputate. Nam tempor sapien ac leo interdum condimentum. Mauris vel volutpat purus.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Pertinacia scriptorem proinc</title>
		<link>http://strikingrwptheme.com/2016smalldemo/2010/09/30/pertinacia-scriptorem-proinc/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Sep 2010 17:59:18 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin-wpt]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/?p=224</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Elcvne commune elaboraret his, mea amet luptatum at. Modo aeterno propriae ius id. Viris definiebas reprehendunt ad eam. In mea melius commodo.

Te usu causae efficiendi. Nusquam percipitur cotidieque ut vis. An est vocent fabellas platonem, eu dico elitr feugait per. Et veri posse everti vix, te reque option corpora nam, vim audire molestiae necessitatibus ad. Quis soleat mei eu, tale epicurei consequat ne nec, ad ius erant graeco commune.

Cras mi lacus, adipiscing vitae aliquet eu, imperdiet sit amet risus. Pellentesque at quam purus, sed consequat dolor. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nam neque diam, ultrices ut viverra non, vehicula quis tellus. Pellentesque dapibus ullamcorper leo ornare pulvinar. Sed vel dui ipsum. Pellentesque sit amet felis turpis. Nunc lacinia pretium mauris, vitae lacinia magna lobortis ultrices. Maecenas vel luctus magna. Integer nec venenatis risus. Phasellus condimentum, tortor vel venenatis viverra, nunc enim adipiscing justo, id tincidunt dolor magna at nunc. Morbi euismod mi facilisis metus porta ac malesuada enim luctus.

Morbi in sem quis dui placerat ornare. Pellentesque odio nisi, euismod  in, pharetra a, ultricies in, diam. Sed arcu. Cras consequat. Vivamus  magna. Cras in mi at felis aliquet.

]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Easy Slideshow Creator</title>
		<link>http://strikingrwptheme.com/2016smalldemo/?post_type=slideshow&#038;p=1613</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 05 Nov 2013 14:27:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin-wpt]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/?post_type=slideshow&#038;p=1613</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="color: #ff0000;">The content in this area will not show as this slider item is an "easy slideshow Creator" built slider item.</span></p>
Below is the <strong>MultiFlex Slideshow Item Options Metabox</strong>. If you do not see it, click on the <em><strong>Screen Options</strong></em> tab in the upper right hand of this E<strong>dit Slider Item</strong> panel. Checkmark the box for<em> SlideShow Item Options,</em> and the metabox will show.

The Easy Slideshow Creator (ESC) can be used with any of the Striking Multiflex sliders other then the Revolution Slider.

The ESC allows you to simply drag and drop some images from your desktop using the Add Images button below, choose whether to display a caption, a description (not all sliders support description), and presto, instant slideshow!

Some other considerations:

a) Assign each ESC slider item a unique category. Sliders display items in categories, not individual items, so assign each ESC a unique category in most circumstances.

b) Even after you have loaded up your images, you can edit the details or delete each one below. Clicking on the Edit button allows you to modify the image title, caption, description, alt title, and even change the image if you wish.  So you don't have to have decided upon the details of each image in advance, and you can change your mind as often as you wish!

c) You do not need to assign a featured image to an ESC slider item.

d)  All the images should be the same size, and conform to the height and width you have set for the Slideshow Preset (go the Slideshow Panel to create a unique slideshow preset for any of the Slider types in MultiFlex other then the Revolution Slider of course).    Remember you can create as many slider presets as you like in MultiFlex, each with unique settings including height and width, and then you can create slider items using the ESC for these Slider presets.  If the slider is one of the ones shortcoded in Multiflex then the slider presets will be available in the shortcode as well as the ESC items.  So we have you covered on all bases.  Easy Peasy!!

<span style="text-decoration: underline;">That's it! </span> The whole idea of the Easy Slideshow Creator is to enable you to create a super quick, but flexible slideshow.   We do recommend you not have more then 15 items in any one ESC, and remember, the more items in a slideshow, the more images therefore to load, and thus an increased page loading time.]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
